    • Method Detail

      • expand

        public byte[] expand(byte[] data)
        Expand function (E) of the DES cipher. Used in the Feistel function to expand the right half-block to 48 bits.
        Parameters:
        data - 32-bit half-block to be expanded.
        Returns:
        48-bit block.

      • initialPermutation

        public byte[] initialPermutation(byte[] data)
        Initial permutation (IP) of the DES cipher.
        Parameters:
        data - 64-bit block to undergo IP.
        Returns:
        Permuted 64-bit block.

      • finalPermutation

        public byte[] finalPermutation(byte[] data)
        Final permutation (FP) of the DES cipher.
        Parameters:
        data - 64-bit block to undergo FP.
        Returns:
        Permuted 64-bit block.

      • permutationP

        public byte[] permutationP(byte[] data)
        Permutation part of the feistel function.
        Parameters:
        data - 32-bit half-block.
        Returns:
        permuted half-block.

      • substitute

        public byte substitute(int boxNumber,
                       byte data)
        Substitution function for DES.
        Parameters:
        boxNumber - Number of the s-box used (0-based).
        data - Six bits of data to be fed into the s-box. Two high-order bits are unused.
        Returns:
        4-bit value from the s-box. Four high-order bits are unused.

      • feistelFunction

        public byte[] feistelFunction(byte[] data,
                              byte[] subkey)
        Feistel function for DES.
        Parameters:
        data - Right half-block (32 bits) of the block being processed.
        subkey - 48-bit subkey from the key schedule.
        Returns:
        32-bit half-block.

      • encrypt

        Encrypt a single block of data.

        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Encrypted block.
